Reviews.Title: “Hotel Reding”
Reviews.Author: Chewbutters
Reviews.Content: introduced boutique hotel rick steves travel book spain centrally located plaza catalunya barcelona inside walled hotel 44 modern wonderful staff help plus associated restaurant breakfast nice included stayed nights happy choice

Reviews.Title: “Location is almost perfect”
Reviews.Author: Miss_manou
Reviews.Content: smal hotel perfect location middle city centre perfect weekend wont hotel sleeping breakfast simple ok starbucks corner coffee beds ok bathroom simple clean free wifi thats plus

Reviews.Title: “posizione ottima”
Reviews.Author: PrincipeRoma
Reviews.Content: barcellona fantastic city party 8 persons perfect positions close catalunya square ramblas subway stop clean woman receptionist helpfull cuban lady bar funny extra bed third person comfortable staff arranged 430 am expensive transfer airport leave bus catalunya square main airport 550 euros person value

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Comfortable hotel near the Ramblas...but without the noise!”
Reviews.Author: mosiniak
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel nights february 2012 hotel located near university top ramblas starts placa catalunya location perfect walking sites catching city tour buses catching metro close close street noise night staff friendly helpful clean comfortable typical european double bed actually twin beds pushed eat hotel restaurant comment quality food service etc

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, good location”
Reviews.Author: PhilbeachTraveller
Reviews.Content: booked air miles offer 3 nights price 2 easy aerobus literally 2 minutes walk reception lobby nice breakfast basement cafebar attached hotel charge busy bit lively evening sundays 3rd floor front absolutely fine clean modernish desk flat screen telly double bed singles pushed minibar didnt prices water wasnt horribly expensive free wifi bit weak signal satellite telly 3 english language channels news bathroom spotless shower bath nice toiletries concur reviewers noisy people corridor sounded bathroom hear people stomping luckily elderly couple door noise faced street wasnt bad past visits spain aware late night rubbish collection windows 11 pm fine saturday night definite night people yelling fighting etc air conditioning breakfast buffet hot cold food spanish specialities hours breakfast served 11 coffee machine cup machine splattered coffee dispenser carefully table spillage otherwise plenty fresh food nice decor location waking barcelona metro station nearby

Reviews.Title: “Excellent base camp for exploring Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Jussi H
Reviews.Content: hotel central location busy noisy street clean staff friendly dealt reception spoke english beds comfortable ones ive slept bad walls bit thin hear noises especially showers wasnt bad slept ok hotel cheap breakfast included price tried day definitely worth extra 15e

Reviews.Title: “1 of the better ones”
Reviews.Author: MalcKentEngland
Reviews.Content: checking fast staff helpful hotel ideally located tourist bus road underground railway station corner twin spotless beds comfortable aircon heating depending set tea coffee facilites toiletries refreshed day breakfasts superb people liked eggs bacon various sausages mushrooms fruit cerals fussy liked bar hotel selection drinks snacks try resturant evening sunday evening try itit shut resturant corner hotel called hotel 60 mtrs food reasonably price staff look eat 4 times time service food fault tip catch a1 bus 10 euros return airport sets square 100mtrs hotel run 10 mins signposted airport fountain display espana catalana museums runs 2 hrs roughly metro hotel 4 stops

Reviews.Title: “Great location but don't get an adjoining room”
Reviews.Author: sanpanchocasa
Reviews.Content: requested balcony happy arrive actually gotten dont balcony adjoining ones definitely request door thin plus gap bottom met floor effect heard footstep creaky floor suitcase zipper conversations else night door occupied awoken sound door closing heard footsteps bed entered sounded nearby realized people door bad loved location close las ramblas quiet street

Reviews.Author: Jeffskins
Reviews.Content: start saying location excellent sleep bed night hotel walls paper thin hear happens door simple conversation tv radio night people door party night wont sleeping staff helpful stayed 509 208 comfortable paid hotel stayed hotels madrid toledo opinion location worth money internet free luck getting signal

Reviews.Title: “Barcelona treasure”
Reviews.Author: NanaLindaIndy
Reviews.Content: spent 5 nights hotel barcelona exceptional value plaza metro 3 blocks ramblas catalunya metro shopping plus starbucks 3 4 blocks staff excellent knowledgable hotel clean comfortable york spacious cant recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good location but avoid the first floor rooms”
Reviews.Author: fleur1104
Reviews.Content: hotel location 5 minutes walk placa top ramblas safe surrounding airport bus stops closeby airport city centre round walk catalunya catch decent size fairly clean noise 101 reception constant noise night guests ring bell gain entry front door loud chat receptionist stay definitely upper floors

Reviews.Title: “A good choice in Barcellona”
Reviews.Author: Sofonisba23
Reviews.Content: hotel located ramblas noise near metro nice pictures price breakfast included staff cleaning choice search expensive quiet

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, convenient, and good value.”
Reviews.Author: kaydc
Reviews.Content: hotel easy walking distance sites center city walked gaudi sites distance comfortable bathroom equipped free computers available internet englishlanguage channels television staff terrific friendly helpful didnt breakfast expensive lots definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value, great location”
Reviews.Author: travelluver222
Reviews.Content: husband teenagers stayed nights christmas clean staff responsive spoke fluent english ready arrived 10am overnight flight appreciated able check pictures hotels website furnished sizes ample nice beds firm comfortable faced quiet front street quiet hotel walls pretty bothered husband hearing enjoyed free computers guest hotel free wifi breakfast bacon pastries cold cuts juices cappucino machine 950 euros pp include price worth hotel price 14 euros probably gone elsewhere location minute walk universitat metro stop 5 minute walk placa catalyuna metro square top ramblas gladly stay minor hotel cheap soap bring bar own definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Adequate”
Reviews.Author: Waddlerstrikesback
Reviews.Content: adequate clean 2 english tv breakfast priced €14 avail expensive immediate vicinity noise feature mini bar prices crisps charged staff helpful location perfect bar inviting €80 double dear neither bargain

Reviews.Title: “Great location.”
Reviews.Author: snoozedoctor
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights neatly appointed mattress firm soft poorly soundinsulated ive found true hotels europe breakfast little overpriced hotel location convenient ramblas sidestreet loud night

Reviews.Title: “excellent choice”
Reviews.Author: Kristabella_81
Reviews.Content: husband spent week barcelona hotel july 2010 fell love city definitely hotel plus trip unforgetable pros location quiet street 3 min foot placa catalunya rambla 2 min foot placa stop aerobus coming airport cleanliness helpful staff incredible breakfast including eggs traditional spanish products fruits cookies cereals orange juice nice trouble noise amenities cons none trip short recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very professional. Would stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: MikefromSeattle
Reviews.Content: recently completed six night stay hotel close las ramblas 34 block walk midst intensity las ramblas scene metro stop block helpful courteous staff spoke english breakfast substantial tasty check internet specials

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: historian90
Reviews.Content: night stay celebrate golden anniversary hotel clean comfortable medium size helpful staff specially reception hotel noisy ideally located quiet street close las ramblas placa catalyuna metro stations close easy walking distance gothic quarter breakfast cafe coffee bar restaurant
